xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 3 Āsavagocchaka » 3.3 Āsavasampayuttaduka » 3.3.1 Paṭiccavāra » 3.3.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 3.3.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Āsavagocchaka
Āsavasampayuttaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
48.
1095Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  āsavasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… . (1)
1096Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  āsavasampayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, domanassasahagate ( ) khandhe paṭicca moho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. (2)
1097Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto ca āsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—  āsavasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  domanassasahagataṃ ( ) ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā moho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… . (3)
49.
1098Āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  āsavavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  domanassasahagataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā, tayo mahābhūte paṭicca ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ, dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. (1)
1099Āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  domanassasahagataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā. (2)
1100Āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto ca āsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—  domanassasahagataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. (3)
50.
1101Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  domanassasahagataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca mohañca paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… . (1)
1102Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  āsavasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, domanassasahagate vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca mohañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (2)
1103Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto ca āsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—  domanassasahagataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca mohañca paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe…pe… . (3)
